author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Place the vegetables and flavourings in a roasting tin.   Season with salt and pepper and drizzle with olive oil.   Roast for 20 minutes.  When cooked, transfer into a blender and blend until smooth.  Add some water if necessary and serve.
ingredients: ½ red onion, chopped,  ¼ squash, cut into wedges,  2 garlic cloves,  1 sprig thyme,  1 chilli, sliced,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tbsp olive oil,  water for blending (optional)
